titles.title: Community Savings and Investment Act of 1999
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to encourage a strong community-based banking system.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 10/5/1999--Introduced. Community Savings and Investment Act of 1999 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) establish a separate tax rate for a qualified community lender; and (2) permit the exclusion from gross income of distressed community banking income.
